messages.message:
Hi all! I've also been running into localhost issues and was wondering if people have tips: I get the "An unexpected error occurred." screen after logging in from localhost. This was after attempting to fix the monaco bugs by repulling from master and recompiling and restarting webapp, apps-server, and server-nginx.

Since then I've tried repulling from master, rebuilding and re-running all of the lite services, and logging in from an incognito tab but still run into the error screen :disappointed: .
tldr i think you need to rebuild and restart core-platform-service as well
ah ok i think after restarting a bunch of services it is working again, thanks!
